title: Kind barber gives 7-year-old boy with autism haircut outside to make him feel comfortable
text:
Marco Conti gave Brycen Juby his first professional haircut outside to make the boy feel more comfortable. (Picture: Fox 59)

A kindhearted barber gave a seven-year-old boy with autism a haircut outside to soothe the youngster’s nerves.

Ashley Juby said her son Brycen needed a trim before picture day at his school this week, which was especially important because this is Brycen’s first year at public school in Mentor, Ohio.

She said daily tasks can sometimes be challenging for her son, so Brycen’s father usually cuts his hair.

However, she hoped her son could get a professional trim for his first school picture day, so she reached out to Marky Freshy Barbershop and asked if her son could come in after the barbershop closed, hoping he would be more comfortable when the shop was less busy.

Marco Conti, the owner of Marky Fresh Barbershop, did not hesitate to accommodate their request.

Conti said: ‘We try to make it an equal playing field for everybody and we try to adapt to that you know person and try to make it a personal experience for them.’

After Brycen arrived with his father, Conti decided to cut his hair on the sidewalk outside his barbershop, which is where the boy felt most at ease.

Conti said: ‘He was comfortable outside so why not just bring a chair outside and do the hair cut outside.

A photo taken of Brycen’s first professional haircut shows him in the chair outside as his dad comforts him by cradling his face.

Ashley later said: ‘He (Conti) was so accommodating and reassured me that everything would be great and it was.’

Conti said the outdoor haircut was no bother – and his act of kindness may have earned him a new customer in Brycen.

He said: ‘It’s really part of the experience. We want everyone that comes in here to feel good and leave even better.’
description: Barber Marco Conti gave Brycen Juby his first professional haircut outside to make the boy feel more comfortable in Mentor, Ohio.
